"Ride-sharing meets personal transportation: Create a self-driving car service that allows individuals to rent a car for their daily commute or travel needs without having to operate it themselves."
"Smart city transportation: Partner with local governments to create a network of self-driving cars that can be used as public transportation in congested urban areas."
"Health and wellness: Develop a self-driving car that is equipped with fitness tracking technology and can be used as a personal trainer on the go."
"Green transportation: Use self-driving cars to create a carbon-neutral transportation system by replacing traditional gas-powered vehicles with electric ones."
"Personalized entertainment: Integrate self-driving cars with high-tech audio systems and virtual reality technology to create a fully immersive entertainment experience for passengers."
